
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu)
target_link_libraries(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  catboost-cuda-cuda_lib
  catboost-cuda-targets
  catboost-libs-logging
  catboost-libs-metrics
  private-libs-options
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-threading-local_executor
)
target_link_options(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lcudadevrt
  -lculibos
  -lcudart_static
)
target_sources(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/cuda/targets/bin/ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu/main.cpp
)
target_allocator(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(ndcg_cpu_vs_gpu)
